actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. _Hit:_ 3 (1d4+1) slashing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Charming Mewl
bonus_actions.desc: The cat emits a soft, high-pitched meow at a creature it can see within 10 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 11 CHA save or be charmed until the end of its next turn. If a creature's save is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the cat's Charming Mewl for the next 24 hours.

special_abilities.name: Heightened Smell
special_abilities.desc: The cat's Perception is 18 when perceiving by smell.
